children.text: This application is provided 'as is' and is NOT endorsed in any way by the Washington Metropolitan Area Transit Authority (WMATA) or NextBus.com.

The application developer shall be referred to as the author.

Portions of this application REQUIRE a data connection for full functionality which may result in additional charges from your service provider. This application contacts the NextBus.com web site to obtain current data.
 
The Data is provided on an "as is" and "as available" basis. Neither the author nor WMATA nor NextBus.com makes any representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied. The author and WMATA and NextBus.com disclaims all warranties, express or implied, including but not limited to implied warranties of merchantability and fitness for a particular purpose. The author, WMATA, NextBus.com, and their employees, officers, directors and agents will not be liable for damages of any kind arising from the use of the Data including but not limited to direct, indirect, incidental, punitive and consequential damages.
 
WMATA and NextBus.com reserve the right to alter and/or no longer provide the Data at any time without prior notice. At such time, this application will no longer provide real-time data.
